sentences.sContent: ...a nationwide system of aqueducts to carry water to the arid parts of this country.
sentences.sCn: ...一个将水输送到该国干旱地区的全国性输水系统。

remMethod.val: aque ( = aqu， 水) + duct (引导) → 导水管

trans.tranOther: An aqueduct is a large pipe or canal that carries a water supply to a city or a farming area
